hiveArticle.title: B&W Photo Contest - Water - Entry #3 - View from Lake Pichola
hiveArticle.body:
This is my third entry for the B&W photo contest initiated by @daveks and sponsored by @papa-pepper.

### View from the Lake Pichola in Udaipur, India

Udaipur in Rajasthan, India, has many historical places to visit and you can see them while having a boat ride in the Lake Pichola. The building which you are seeing was a fort earlier which was converted as a 5 star hotel. 

<hr>

  ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/08mfpz18cw.jpg)

<hr>

Camera : Nokia 6, Edited to Black and White

 <hr>
